pageContext.claim: “North Carolina, they [Democrats] couldn't do it. I won North Carolina. They couldn't -- somehow, they had a better system. But they couldn't do anything. I believe they tried.”
pageContext.analysis: On election night, Trump had a pretty good lead in North Carolina and it shrank, but not enough for Biden to take the lead as he did in Georgia. Trump has never explained how the post-election shift in votes nearly worked in his favor in Arizona, where Biden's substantial lead on election night was whittled down until Biden achieved only a very narrow victory.
